about_the_game:
Become a paranormal renovator!

Set out on a path of a ghost-hunting renovator. Your task - restore haunted houses to a usable state! This is not an easy job, applying a new wallpaper won't be enough to render a house safe. You also need to deal with whatever is haunting it.

Accept requests to renovate haunted houses from various eccentric owners. Scout abandoned mansions and look for signs of any paranormal activity. Make sure you're ready for the job by preparing a set of tools to aid your work.

Chase away ghosts by any means possible. Sometimes your job will be as easy as catching an entity with a net and sometimes you will need to draw elaborate magic circles and perform sinister rituals. And if nothing works, you can always look for an alternative way to solve your issue - regular hauntings have two ways of getting rid of them, nice and mean. Choose your playstyle and earn different rewards based on your choices. You can even adopt certain hauntings!

Looks are important, especially when convincing your customers that a house is safe. Change wallpapers, paint the walls, and replace furniture. Find a passion for interior decorations as you do what you can to keep a house from looking haunted.

Features

  • First-person paranormal renovator simulator

  • Spooky, not scary - it's all about the atmosphere rather than actual fear

  • Realistic, moody graphics

  • Many different haunted houses and flats, each with its own story to tell

  • A large selection of interior decorations

  • Investigation element when dealing with Wraiths - major hauntings

  • Two ways of solving every minor haunting - a nice way and a mean way

  • Adoption mechanic for some select hauntings

  • Expansive upgrade system for your tools and abilities

  • Singleplayer campaign mode with story elements

name: Haunted House Renovator
short_description: Become a paranormal renovator! Explore and renovate haunted locations as you deal with pesky spirits that have fun at your expense! Decide if you want to be mean or nice to banished entities, you can also adopt some! Restore old furniture and decorate the interiors as you see fit! Make a profit!
